recommendations: Thomas Keegan “Sara is one of the brightest, tenacious and lateral thinking professionals ive had the pleasure of working with in the Middle East. Her ability to think big about even bigger problems sets her apart as a true strategist and leader in her field. With Sara as GM at FBN I can only see bigger and better things from an already incredible first few years. It was an absolute pleasure to serve Sara and FBN and I hope to be able to continue to do so for many years to come.”

First Licensee and Organizer of TEDxTehran (2012-2014), Co-Organizer (2014) and Strategic Advisor (2015-2016)The 2013 TEDxTehran event was the first ever TEDx in Iran launched with the support of Iranian volunteers and mentorship of Giorgio Ungania.           First Licensee and Organizer of TEDxTehran (2012-2014), Co-Organizer (2014) and Strategic Advisor (2015-2016)The 2013 TEDxTehran event was the first ever TEDx in Iran launched with the support of Iranian volunteers and mentorship of Giorgio Ungania. Some of the strategic activities and initiatives originated by Sara:- Establishment of legal entity, Vira Institute- TEDxTehran branding, including tagline "Ideas to Make the World a Better Place" - Theme concepts (Verge of Breakthrough, A New Paradigm, Good Morning Tehran)- Citizen X Award- Personality-based networking (with Propel International)- TEDxTehran Favourite City Apps
